title: Advantage

On the other hand, disadvantage means that you roll the d20 two times but in this case, use the lower of the two values. Disadvantage is one of the worst situations you can be on when rolling on D&D, and should be avoided at all costs. While advantage nearly doubles your chance of success and should be sought out.

How to get Advantage How to get Disadvantage Attacking an enemy while being hidden or invisible.
